nodes.text: Satal Keto was a male individual who, according to the quasi-historical Qel-Droma Epics, was a leader of the Krath, a dark side cult formed on the planet Empress Teta by corrupt noble descendants of Empress Teta. The epics claimed Keto discovered a Sith Translation Talisman on Onderon that allowed its wearer to understand Force-imbued Sith writings, subsequently reproducing the artifact to train his fellow Krath.
